original_title: The Story of the 2003 St. Louis Rams: Gateway to the Best
overview: The St. Louis Rams figured prominently in the National Football League's thrilling 2003-04 season, making quite an impression on the field as the team nabbed their second division title in just three impressive and exciting years. Catch all the thrills and spills -- and get an incredibly detailed recap to boot -- on this video (part of a series produced by the NFL) that collects highlights from every game the Rams played.
title: The Story of the 2003 St. Louis Rams: Gateway to the Best
